CustomObject.description: Custom metadata catalog of Salesforce Email Templates synchronized via EmailTemplateSyncService for use in onboarding communications. Mirrors EmailTemplate records from Salesforce, providing a read-only reference for Communication_Template__c records and ensuring templates are available for onboarding email communications. Example: An Email_Template_Catalog metadata record might have DeveloperName__c="Onboarding_Requirement_Complete", Folder_Name__c="Onboarding", and Communication_Type__c="Email". The sync process (EmailTemplateSyncService) runs nightly or manually to keep this catalog synchronized with source EmailTemplate records. This enables Communication_Template__c to reference templates without querying EmailTemplate directly, improving performance and ensuring consistency. Templates are linked to Vendor Programs through Vendor_Program_Recipient_Group__c associations for automated communication workflows.
CustomObject.label: Email Template Catalog
